title: Scent Bottle, 1920-19-33, 19th century
dimensions: H x diam.: 11 x 2 cm (4 5/16 x 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Cigar-shaped scent bottle with metal trim and chain.  Shape is cylindrical with hemispherical ends with silver top with chain mounted at about three-quarters of entire length with small opening.  Hinged silver collar holds glass top, remaining one quarter of entire length.  Glass is double, enclosing pierced rococo scrolls. Simple band engraving on each silver collar.
